title: Secrets of the underwater world
brief_description: Describes many of the unusual creatures to be found in the shallow seas in the tidal fringe and in fresh water, including the stickleback, diving spider, archer fish, kelpfish, jellyfish, centophere, angler fish, decorator crab, and fiddler crab. Originally released as part of the Disney feature ‘Secrets of life’.
